name: TrueNAS Community Edition
description: TrueNAS Community Edition is the world's most deployed storage software. Free, flexible and build on OpenZFS with Docker.

notes.text: The default install uses the latest stable release. Please use advanced install for more options.
8 GB of RAM is the minimum requirement, but 16 GB+ is recommended for optimal performance.
After installation, you will be prompted to unmount the media. To do this: Go to the VM's Hardware tab > select the CD/DVD Drive > Edit > select 'Do not use any media'
While you can import onboard disks during install, it is highly recommended to use an HBA to pass through disks for production environments.
ECC RAM is strongly recommended to ensure data integrity, as ZFS checksumming can be compromised by bad data in RAM before the data is written to the pool.
